document_data.name: Room of the Red Banner
document_data.mainbody: The '''Room of the Red Banner''' was a room in [[Castle Obarskyr]], [[Suzail]].
document_data.History: The nobleman [[Nethglas Stormserpent]] had pranked the nobility by taking the ''[[Wyverntongue Chalice]]'' from the Room of the Red Banner to a room near the [[Dragonskull Chamber]] at some point on or prior to {{yearlinkName|1437}}.
